title: Colombian Chicken Stew With Potatoes, Tomato, and Onion Recipe
full_text:
Colombian Chicken Stew With Potatoes, Tomato, and Onion Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Cook
25 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
30 mins
Serves
4 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
4
large
Russet or
Yukon Gold potatoes
, peeled and cut into 1- to 2-inch chunks
1
large
onion
, sliced into 1/4-inch slices (about
1 1/2
cups
)
4
medium
beefsteak tomatoes
, cut into 1- to 2-inch chunks (about
3
cups
)
1
whole
chicken
, back removed, cut into
8
pieces
(about
4
pounds
), or
4
whole
chicken legs
, cut into thighs and drumsticks
2
bay leaves
Kosher salt
and freshly ground black pepper
Directions
Combine potatoes, onion, tomatoes, chicken pieces, bay leaves, and a large pinch of salt in a pressure cooker. Toss with hands to combine. Seal lid and cook under high pressure for 25 minutes. Release pressure, remove lid, season to taste, and serve.
Special equipment
Electric or stovetop pressure cooker
Colombian
Braised & Stewed Chicken
Pressure Cooked Chicken
Whole Chicken
Russet Potatoes
